meanings.sent1: She is the nerdiest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: He always wears the nerdiest glasses.
meanings.sent3: The nerdiest bookworm in town won the spelling bee.
meanings.sent4: His nerdiest obsession is collecting vintage comic books.
meanings.sent5: The nerdiest computer programmer you'll ever meet can code in multiple languages.

meanings.sent1: The nerdiest group of friends always talk about science fiction.

meanings.sent5: The nerdiest movie marathon lasted for 24 hours straight.
